text: Joseph Raz (; ; 21 March 1939 â€“ 2 May 2022) was an Israeli philosopher. He was one of the most well known supporters of legal positivism. He was a professor of philosophy of law at the University of Oxford. He was also a professor of law at Columbia University and a part-time professor at King's College London. Raz died on 2 May 2022 at a hospital in London, England at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Israeli academics Category:Israeli philosophers
